address: Xã Quảng Lâm, Huyện Bảo Lâm, Tỉnh Cao Bằng
thought:
**Determining the New Administrative Unit for "Xã Quảng Lâm, Huyện Bảo Lâm, Tỉnh Cao Bằng"**

Okay, so I've been asked to figure out the new administrative unit for "Xã Quảng Lâm, Huyện Bảo Lâm, Tỉnh Cao Bằng". First things first, I need to pinpoint the province, which is "Tỉnh Cao Bằng".

My initial thought is to check if Cao Bằng has undergone any major structural changes. I'll refer to Resolution 60-NQ/TW to see if any mergers or splits have happened. According to that resolution, Cao Bằng hasn't been merged, so that's good news.

Now, I'm diving deeper into resolutions specific to Cao Bằng, particularly those discussing changes at the ward level. Resolution 1657/NQ-UBTVQH15 catches my eye. It focuses on the rearrangement of administrative units within Cao Bằng. Line 1 specifically states: "Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của xã Thạch Lâm vàxã Quảng Lâm thành xã mới có tên gọi là **xã Quảng Lâm**."

This is key! It clearly mentions that the old "Xã Quảng Lâm" is part of the process of creating a *new* "Xã Quảng Lâm". This means the old ward is essentially re-created, likely after a merger with another existing ward.

I'm confident in this finding, as the resolution explicitly links the old "Xã Quảng Lâm" to the new "Xã Quảng Lâm". However, I'll take a moment to ensure that there aren't any conflicting units with the same name in different provinces.

After reviewing resolutions from other provinces like Điện Biên and Quảng Ninh, I can confirm that there aren't any conflicts, as those resolutions relate to different provinces.

So, after careful consideration, it appears that the new administrative unit for "Xã Quảng Lâm, Huyện Bảo Lâm, Tỉnh Cao Bằng" is, in fact, "Xã Quảng Lâm". I can confidently compile the data into the proper JSON output and finalize my response.

citation.header: 1657/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Cao Bằng
citation.line: 1. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của xã Thạch Lâm vàxã Quảng Lâm thành xã mới có tên gọi là xãQuảng Lâm.
